title: The Scrum Guide
description: Ken Schwaber and Jeff Sutherland developed Scrum; the Scrum Guide is written and provided by them. Together, they stand behind the Scrum Guide.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Answers to quesitons the coaching team at DPECP hear often.

title: Slack
description: Come hang out with the coaches and others who share tips and engage in great converstaions daily

title: Request Consultation
description: Need more help than is in the app? Shoot us an email and let us know how we can help you

title: Mountain Goat Software Blog
description: Read some great content from one of the original creators of Scrum, Mike Cohn
